name: Death's Daughter
simpleDescription: <mainText>Cannon Barrage additionally fires a mega-cannonball at the center of the Barrage, dealing <trueDamage>bonus true damage</trueDamage> and <status>Slowing</status>.</mainText>

passives.name: Death's Daughter
passives.effects: A massive cannonball lands after {{ais|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}} first cluster of waves, dealing {{sti|true damage|{{as|{{ap|120 to 300 3}}|true damage}}}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|true damage}} to enemies struck and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 75% for 1 second.
